General_Description: '''Poison in the Air''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "The [[Sparta|enemy]] is slowly settling into strong positions. Put some spice in their routine so they have something to fear."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed a number of Spartan [[soldier]]s with heavy bladed weapons and torches, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
